titles.title: Quicken Us Together By Thy Spirit, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Quicken us together by Thy Spirit, Lord.
Open up before us treasures of the word.
Teach us how to live and walk in one accord
Change us to the image of our blessed Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Quicken us together as a family, Lord
Chasten us until we manifest Thy Word
Teach us how to live and walk as Sons of God
Change us to the image of our Blessed Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Vivificanos juntos con tu Espiritu Señor.
Hablanos riquezas de tu palabra mejor.
Enseñanos a vivir y andar de acuerdo ya.
Cambiados a la imagen del bendito Señor.
